home.help_text_1: You will need either a SMILES string or list of SMILES; an ID or list of IDs; or a SD file

add.smiles_or_id_label: Paste your SMILES or IDs here
add.smiles_or_id_help_text: IDs can be any of the following formats: InCHI, InCHI key, SMILES, CAS numbers, Sigma aldrich catalogue numbers
add.file_upload_help_text: Chemdraw XML or SD files only
add.drawing_help_text: Draw the molecule you would like to register. If salts or hydrates are required, draw these as neutral molecules alongside
add.sd_invalid: The SD file uploaded was not of a valid format, please verify
add.cdmxl_invalid: The Chemdraw XML file uploaded was not of a valid format, please verify
add.mol_success: n records were succesfully digitised as displayed below
add.sd_mol_invalid: The molecules at lines line in the sd file were not valid due to valency or similar errors, please check and re-upload
add.cdmxl_mol_invalid: The molecule in the uploaded file was not of a valid format due to valency errors or miscelaneous non-chemical content
add.drawing_mol_invalid: The drawn molecule was not of a valid format due to valency errors or miscelaneous non-chemical content
add.mol_pains_hits_warning: n molecules are classified as Pan Assay Interference Compounds - are you sure you wish to register these?
add.mol_pains_hits_success: No molecules are classified as Pan Assay Interference Compounds

map.label: Map the fields in your SD file to those in the registration system
map.help_text: Known fields have already been mapped, other fields that you would like displayed should be dragged to the 'other' section
map.source_id_label: Checking for re-uploaded source ids for these molecules
map.source_id_error: n molecules were found with existing records in the database - ignore or re-upload with a different id

validate.label: We have standardised the format the substances added, here are the results
validate.metals_label: Breaking any bonds to group I or II metals
validate.metals_none_success: No bonds to group I or II metals were found
validate.metals_success: n group I or II metals had their bonds removed
validate.tautomer_redraw_success: Tautomers or charge-separated systems were redrawn as shown for search purposes
validate.neutralise_and_salts_none_success: No salts or charges to neutralise were found
validate.neutralise_success: n salts were found, these were neutralised and the salt was removed for  the default search
validate.isotope_none_success: No isotopically labelled compounds were found, if you were expecting one or more, check your drawings
validate.isotope_success: n records were found with isotopes and the structures were standardised as shown, if you were expecting more - check your drawings
validate.isotope_error: n records were found with errors in the isotope layer, pick an action for each molecule
validate.stereochemistry_error: n records were re-drawn to enable search, molecules will be registered as the drawn enantiomer

finish.registration_success: n molecules were registered with the ids and properties shown below
finish.registration_error: An unknown error occurred when registering compounds, the chembiohub team have been notified and will contact you when the issue has been understood
